WorkItem.Description:
On Rawr 3.0.
 
To recreate issue:
1. Load Rawr 3.0
2. File > Load from Armory
3. Enter name "Artheana" realm "Stonemaul"
 
In all my testing, it sits on "Get Talent Tree From Armory" with detail "TankDK" in the details field and clicking "Cancel All" or close button will not work. Firebug gives a console alert: "unterminated string literal".
WorkItem.Summary: [TankDK|ProtPaladin] Stall on loading Character from Armory

Comments.Message: This is probably because I haven't had a chance to implement any Rawr 3.0 stuff for the Tank DK module.  I need to get to that.  Stupid crunch time at work.  It's on my list.
Is it acceptable to add "damn work getting in the way" as an issue? ;)
I presume this is the same for Prot Paladin in Rawr3.0 as im having the same error occur.

Ok... Got Silverlight 3 installed, and I did a couple tweaks to make sure Rawr3 even builds on my machine (there was a missing linked file) 
Next up:  Get a TankDK module building.

Got the TankDK model building, but the whole Rawr3 project is broken for me.  There are other models that are not building at all.  Not sure if this is an issue w/ other folks, but it certainly makes it difficult to test.

I am able to load ProtPaladins (Catyrpelius @ Korialstrasz-US) and TankDKs (Omgsohigh @ Korialstrasz-US) just fine.  I also was able to load Artheana @ Stonemaul-US, but it came up DPSDK.  And for kicks, I loaded up myself (Roncli @ Korialstrasz-US).  All came up fine.

Make sure you're running the solution with Rawr.Silverlight.Web enabled as the startup project, not Rawr.Sliverlight.
Just checked via Web test server and I was able to load using 2.2.24 - so closing this defect.
